name: Shooty Shooty Train Game
description:
So there's this gorilla. You hate him. Shoot your way to the front of his train and end this rivalry once and for all.

Controls:

Point and click to shoot.

R to begin / end reloading

ESC to open pause menu

Tips:

- When reloading: the closer you get to the center - the faster your reload!

- If you see an explosive flying towards you, try shooting it first!

- Having performance issues? Try downloading the windows version!
